messages.content: I need to make a "travel request" that i made with th ITC before can you give me the previous one I hsared with you?

I can’t see a past “travel request” in this chat history, so I don’t have the exact one you shared before. If you want, I can search your Gmail for “ITC travel request / travel authorization” and pull the last one up here.  

In the meantime, here’s a clean, copy-paste template you can reuse (ITC/UN-style):

```
Subject: Travel Request – [Your Name] – [City A → City B] – [DD Mon YYYY – DD Mon YYYY]

Traveler:
• Name: [Your Name]
• Role/Contract Type: [e.g., Consultant]
• Duty Station: [City, Country]
• Official Email: [you@…]
• Index/HR Reference (if any): [ID]

Purpose & Justification:
• Objective: [e.g., Facilitate BEIT training workshop; stakeholder meetings]
• Expected Results: [e.g., deliver 2-day ToT; sign MoU; site assessment]
• Link to Project/Outcome: [Project code, outcome]

Itinerary:
• Segments: 
  - [City A, Country] → [City B, Country]  | Date: [DD Mon] | Flight preferred window: [time]
  - [City B] → [City A]                    | Date: [DD Mon]
• Travel Dates (incl. travel time): [DD Mon – DD Mon YYYY]
• Visa required: [Yes/No] (details)
• Security clearance (UNDSS/TRIP): [Yes/No/Not applicable]
• Health/Medical clearance: [If required]

Costs (Estimate):
• Airfare: [currency amount]
• DSA/Per Diem: [X days @ rate] = [amount]
• Terminals/Local transport: [amount]
• Visa/Insurance/Other: [amount]
• Total Estimate: [amount]

Funding & Charge Codes:
• Project/Donor: [e.g., ITC Project XXX]
• WBS/GL/IO/Cost Centre: [codes]
• Travel Agent/Ticketing Mode: [UN-approved agent / self-ticketing per policy]

Accommodation & Meetings:
• Hotel: [if known]
• Meeting venue(s): [addresses]
• Focal point(s): [names, emails]

Approvals Requested:
• Supervisor/Project Manager: [Name, Title]
• Budget Holder: [Name]
• Security Focal Point (if applicable): [Name]

Attachments:
• Agenda/Invitation/ToR
• Cost estimate breakdown or quotes
• Any required clearances
```

Want me to look in your Gmail for the previous one and paste it here? If yes, I’ll search and surface the latest matching email.
